title: Nursing Simulation-Based Collaborative Learning Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic nursing theory knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Practical-Centered Program Comprising Five 3-Hour Sessions, Integrating Digital Simulation Tools Using Personal Devices

learning_goals: Learners can execute role allocation and collaborative strategies in patient case simulations with 90% accuracy through group activities (3 members per group).
Learners submit a 100% completed learning improvement plan applying metacognitive strategies through group feedback sessions.
Learners demonstrate team-based problem-solving abilities by achieving a score of 4.0/5.0 or higher on the simulation evaluation rubric.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
